ee kurunagala aluth malkaduwawa samadhi sadaham nikethana parishrayedi pawathi buddha shrawaka thripitaka dharmadhyapana pitayata mulgala thabime uthsawayata sahabhagi wimataya.uthsawaya pawathiye shri lanka ramanynya nikaye maha nayaka wewaldeniye medhalankara nahimipanange pradhanathwayeni.uthsawaya sabhawe idiri pela es. bi. nawinna, ti. bi. eekanayaka, wimal wirawansha athulu mathi amathiwaru rasak asun gena sitiyaha.eksath jathika paksha parlimenthu manthri karu jayasuriya uthsawa sabhawa wetha paminena wita idiri pela asun siyalla piri thibini.eheyin shri lanka ramanynya nikaye nikayarakshaka sabhawe sabhapathi dhuraya da darana karu jayasuriyata sidu wuye pasupela asunaka asun ganimataya.eheth waha madihath wu wimal wirawansha amathiwaraya thaman asalama wu asunak karu jayasuriyata laba dimata katayuthu yediya.in pasuwa parlimenthu manthri karu jayasuriya saha amathya wimal wirawansha athara suhada kathabahak athi wiya.ema uthsawaya nimawen pasu amathi wimal wirawansha badulla bala pitath wuye janasewana nawa niwasa gammana dekaka idikirim pilibanda soya balimatayi.shri lankawe irana islamiya janarajaye nawa thanapathi aacharya mohomad nabi hasanipur saha amathi wimal wirawansha athara wishesha hamuwak pasugiya angaharuwada sethsiripaye pihiti amathyansha karyalayedi sidu wiya.payakata aasanna kalayak pawathi me sakachchawedi wadi awadhanayak yomu wuye amerikawa athulu batahira adhirajyawadi ratawalin anekuth prajathanthrika ratawalata ella wana balapam pilibandawaya.“amerikawa boho prajathanthrika ratawalata asathya chodana nangamin aarthika sambadhaka athulu thahanchi damanawa.eewa hamuwe dana nonamapu swairi ratawalata erehiwa owun nawatha aakramana sidu kirimata pasubata wune naha.”amathi wimal wirawansha menma thanapathiwarayageda adahasa wuye eyayi.“amerikawen bata kana ratawal athara mita wada ekamuthukamak athiwiya yuthuyi.esema anyonya awabodhaya pulul kara gatha yuthuyi.”
